question: Who is the only woman wrestler to have qualified for the Tokyo Olympics, as of March 2021?
explanation:
Ace India wrestler Vinesh Phogat has won the gold medal in 53kg event of the Matteo Pellicone Ranking Series event.
She has also clinched the position of world No.1 in international wrestling. Vinesh Phogat is the only woman wrestler from India to have qualified for the Tokyo Olympic Games.
